opencard.opt.iso.fs

Class CardRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • opencard.opt.iso.fs.CardRecord

  • public class CardRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    The CardRecord class is used by the CardRandomRecordAccess and CardRandomByteAccess classes. Essentially, it just is an encapsulation of a byte array.

    Version:
    $Id: CardRecord.java,v 1.2 1999/11/03 12:37:18 damke Exp $
    Author:
    Dirk Husemann (hud@zurich.ibm.com)
    See Also:
    CardRandomRecordAccess, CardRandomByteAccess
